term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - convex isotherm in chromatography
term.title: convex isotherm

item.text: Distribution isotherm, the slope of which is continuously decreasing.

notes.item: The resulting chromatographic peak is tailing (in chromatography). Adsorption isotherms are often of this type. A special case is the Langmuir adsorption isotherm.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 1591. 'Nomenclature for non-linear chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 1593 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668081591)
